title: Online Learning Engagement Enhancement Through Self-Regulated Strategies Based on Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience in online learning
context.additional_context: A process applying self-regulated learning strategies through real-scenario-based simulations in language learning. Experiments with goal-setting, time management, and motivation strategies in VR environments while measuring and analyzing learning engagement.

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, self-monitoring, environmental control) with over 80% accuracy in a simulated environment.
In VR-based learning activities, learners achieve active participation (discussions, assignment submissions, feedback implementation) at least three times per week.
After completing the course, learners record a self-assessment of 4.0/5.0 or higher on the self-regulated learning readiness survey.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
